hello: Hello! I am a GitHub-powered bot. How can I help you?
hi: Hey there! Nice to see you 😃
how are you: I'm doing great! Running from GitHub responses 🚀
weather: I can’t check real weather, but from GitHub, it’s always sunny!
joke: Why don’t programmers like nature? Too many bugs 🐛
name: I’m the GitHub Offline Bot!
help: You can greet me, ask how I am, ask for my name, the weather, or even a joke.
